name: Bank Report
query:
SELECT		concat(cmp.abbr, '/', date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y/%%d')) AS "Payroll Entry::140",
		date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') AS "Month::140",
		ss.employee		AS "Employee ID::120", 
		ss.employee_name	AS "Employee Name::200", 
		ss.bank_account_no	AS "Account No.::120", 
		emp.bank_code		AS "Bank Code.::120", 
		ss.net_pay		AS "Net Pay:Currency:120"
FROM 	`tabSalary Slip` ss
	LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON ss.employee = emp.name
	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON ss.company = cmp.name 
WHERE	emp.salary_mode = 'Bank'
AND 	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND 	ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
